sn1.12:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn1.12:2: "Nandati puttehi puttimā,Gomā gohi tatheva nandati;Upadhīhi narassa nandanā,Na hi so nandati yo nirūpadhī"ti.
sn1.12:3: "Socati puttehi puttimā,Gomā gohi tatheva socati;Upadhīhi narassa socanā,Na hi so socati yo nirūpadhī"ti.
